text: @realDonaldTrump @GregAbbott_TX Stupid governor would rather please the moron and kill more of his constituents than face ridicule and save lives.  Just proves all #GOP  elected only care about themselves.  Let's watch the #COVID19 cases rise in the next few weeks.
